snippet: Police officers in 14 of the country’s 23 provinces have staged work stoppages in recent days, local news media said.
abstract: Strikes by police officers demanding higher salaries open the way for looting in cities across Argentina.
lead_paragraph: Police officers in 14 of the country’s 23 provinces have staged work stoppages in recent days, local news media said.

headline.main: Argentina: Looting Spreads as Police Officers Stage Strikes
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Looting Spreads As Police Officers Stage Strikes
